question: The ________ is (are) an adjustable voltage regulator.
The ________ the ac variation with respect to the dc level, the ________ the filter circuit's operation.
In a current-limiting circuit, ________ provide(s) the limiting of the maximum load current.
D: both the short-circuit resistor R<sub>sc</sub> and transistor Q<sub>2</sub>

question: IC units provide regulation of ________.
The ________ values of capacitor filter provide ________ ripple and ________ average voltage.
A complete power supply has a ________.
If the value of the full-load voltage is the same as the no-load voltage, the voltage regulation calculated is ________.
The ________ the voltage regulation, the ________ the operation of the voltage supply circuit.
In a half-wave rectifier, the dc voltage level is ________ the ripple voltage level.
The ________ the diode conduction time, the ________ the amount of the charging current through the capacitor filter.
In a foldback configuration, limiting the current reduces ________, protecting the load from overcurrent as well as protecting the regulator.
C: both the output voltage and output current

question: The ripple voltage Vr is a result of the ________.
C: charging and discharging of the capacitor

question: Regulator IC units contain the circuitry for the ________.
A full-wave rectified signal has ________ dc component and ________ ripple than (as) the half-wave rectified voltage.
The series 7900 ICs are ________.
C: both positive and negative voltage regulators

question: The charging and discharging of the capacitor filter take ________ of the period of the input voltage.
The frequency of the output voltage of a full-wave rectifier is ________ the frequency of its input voltage.
A type of regulator circuit that is quite popular for its efficient transfer of power to the load is the ________.
The output resulting from a rectifier is a(n) ________.
In a full-wave rectifier, the dc voltage level is ________ the ripple voltage level.
In a full-wave rectifier, if no load were connected across the capacitor, the output voltage would ideally be a(n) ________.
The output of a loaded power supply is ________ that of the unloaded.
The filter output voltage of a power supply ________ when load current is drawn from the supply.
The specification sheet for the 7812 fixed positive voltage regulator shows that the output voltage could be as low as ________ or as high as ________.
A dc voltmeter reads the ________ while measuring a pulsating dc voltage.
